scene_description_enriched: Two male saints, identified by their halos, are depicted. The saint on the left, wearing a blue tunic and a purple and gold mantle, holds a large key in his left hand and a red book in his right. The saint on the right, dressed in a red and gold garment, holds a sword in his right hand and a red book in his left. Both figures have grey beards and hair, and are looking upwards. The background is a simple green landscape. The scene is framed by a gold border.
